ARABIC: لَئِنۢ بَسَطتَ إِلَىَّ يَدَكَ لِتَقْتُلَنِى مَآ أَنَا۠ بِبَاسِطٍ يَدِىَ إِلَيْكَ لِأَقْتُلَكَ إِنِّىٓ أَخَافُ ٱللَّهَ رَبَّ ٱلْعَٰلَمِينَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Even if you do raise your hand against me to kill me, I am not going to raise my hand against you to kill you. Truly I fear Allah, the Lord of all the worlds.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: If you raise your hand to kill me, I will raise not mine to kill you, for I fear God, the Lord of all the worlds;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Even if you stretch forth your hand against me to kill, I will not stretch forth my hand to kill you. Surely, I fear Allah, the Lord of the entire universe.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Even if you try to kill me, I certainly shall not try to kill you. I have fear of God, the Lord of the creation.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: “Indeed, if you do extend your hand against me to kill me, I will not extend my hand against you to kill you; I fear Allah, the Lord Of The Creation.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: If you do stretch your hand against me to kill me, I shall never stretch my hand against you to kill you, for I fear Allah; the Lord of all that exists."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: If you will stretch forth your hand towards me to slay me, I am not one to stretch forth my hand towards you to slay you surely I fear Allah, the Lord of the worlds:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Yet if thou stretchest out thy hand against me, to slay me, I will not stretch out my hand against thee, to slay thee; I fear God, the Lord of all Being.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Even if thou stretch out thy hand against me to kill me, I shall not stretch out my hand against thee to kill thee, lo! I fear Allah, the Lord of the Worlds.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: If you raise your hand to kill me, I will not raise mine to kill you. I fear God, the Lord of the Universe,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: If thou stretchest forth thine hand against me to slay me, I shall not be stretching forth my hand against thee to slay thee, verily I fear Allah, the Lord of the worlds.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Even if you extend your hand toward me to kill me, I will not extend my hand toward you to kill you. Indeed, I fear Allah, the Lord of all the worlds.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: If thou dost stretch thy hand against me, to slay me, it is not for me to stretch my hand against thee to slay thee: for I do fear Allah, the cherisher of the worlds.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: If you do stretch your hand against me to kill me, I shall never stretch my hand against you to kill you, for I fear Allah; the Lord of the 'Alamin (mankind, jinns, and all that exists)."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: If you stretch your hand to kill me, I shall not stretch mine to kill you; for I fear Allah, the Lord of the Worlds.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: “If you extend your hand to kill me, I will not extend my hand to kill you; for I fear God, Lord of the Worlds.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: If you should raise your hand against me to kill me - I shall not raise my hand against you to kill you. Indeed, I fear Allah, Lord of the worlds.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [5:28] ‘Yet if (la-in, the lām is for oaths) you extend your hand against me to slay me, I will not extend my hand against you to slay you; I fear God, the Lord of the Worlds, in slaying you.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Even if thou stretch out thy hand against me to kill me) wrongfully, (I shall not stretch out my hand against thee to kill you) wrongfully, (lo! I fear Allah, the Lord of the Worlds) if I were to kill you wrongfully.
